description: Lileep became extinct approximately 100 million years before the beginning of the series, but due to scientific advances, can be resurrected from their fossils. They are an aquatic carnivorous species; they use their petal-like tentacles to catch slow prey and ingest it whole. Their coloring assists in this, as it resembles harmless seaweed. Although capable of movement, in the wild Lileep choose one location to stake out and stay there.
name: Lilyla
